name: Wheels of Freedom
description:
Description: Find and pick up the wheels in the stable.

Control:  to move using WASD and mouse.  The character automatically picks up the wheel, just go close to it.

Made by

Viktoria Berta: Project Manager, Environment Artist and Programmer https://www.artstation.com/viktoriaberta 

Adam Hajdu:  Prop Artist https://www.artstation.com/adamhajdu 

Octavio Bernal: Music 

 

Engine: Unreal Engine 5 / Platform: PC / Mode: Single-player
